name: Deserted Crystals
description:
Desert is a virtual environment for interaction with Eternum. Many scientists all over Continuum use it as an interface for communication with Divine Powers. But you are a renegade, and your job is to destroy #0000070674, a universe that is considered to be intellectual and cultural centre of the Continuum.

Take your weapon, pick up ammo, and do what you have to do. Hope you enjoy it.

Don't take it too serious though
